com.quorum.tessera.config.util

Interface PasswordReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsolePasswordReader, InputStreamPasswordReader

    public interface PasswordReader
    Allows a password to be read from the System console if it is available otherwise reads from the provided input stream

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String readPasswordFromConsole()
      Read a password from either system console or the given stream
      default String requestUserPassword()
      Requests user input for a password until two matching consecutive entries are made
      static SystemAdapter sys() 

    • Method Detail

      • readPasswordFromConsole

        String readPasswordFromConsole()
        Read a password from either system console or the given stream
        Returns:
        the read password, which may be empty if no password is given

      • requestUserPassword

        default String requestUserPassword()
        Requests user input for a password until two matching consecutive entries are made
        Returns:
        The password that the user has input

      • sys

        static SystemAdapter sys()
